name: Cado Gifts, Inc.
description: Developer of a gifting platform designed to offer gifting services across the UAE. The company platform offers a wide range of products and experiences that have been carefully selected and curated by the in-house gifting experts, enabling clients to follow the trend and gift the most unique products personalized with high touch service.
